home.title: Home
home.description: Hi, I am Julio. Here you'll find a bit about my job as a front-end developer!

me.title: jlozovei
about: Hello, welcome! My name is Julio Lozovei, and I work as a front-end developer.

Born and raised in Curitiba, Brazil, currently working for Bcredi; I started to write HTML when was 15 y/o and never stopped since there. Besides writing code, I also write and talk about general technology, development culture and career.
In my spare time I love to play video games, play some music, write about life and create playlists on Spotify (check'em out!).
You can find my texts in those links below:

uses.title: Things I Use

labs.title: Labs
